fields.description: A 2D array representing planes of blocks within the volume, where each character represents a lookup into the key.

description: Defines a 3D volume of blocks in the world using a layered ASCII-art style format. Each character in the pattern maps to a block type through a key lookup, enabling efficient representation of structures like buildings, obstacles, or test arenas.
